page.description: Navigates to the next/previous 'page' of data in a List that has been configured to use pagination. List must be configured as paginated.

argument.name: listId
argument.description: The name of the List control.

argument.name: direction
argument.description: Configuration of list, can be one of the following:

item.name: first
item.description: Navigate to the first page in the List control.

item.name: prev
item.description: Navigate to the previous page in the List control.

item.name: next
item.description: Navigate to the next page in the List control.

item.name: last
item.description: Navigate to the last page in the List control.
